title: sharaNu bhArati dEvige
sahitya:
sharaNu bhArati dEvige sharaNu vAyu ramaNige


anupallavi

  sharaNu sharaNara poreva karuNige sharaNu suravara dEvige


caraNam 1    suraru modalAdavarigrella parama mangaLavIvaLe caraNa kamalake mareya hokkenu karuNisenage sumatigaLa
    caraNam 2    pingaLa rUpau mangaLa mahimaLe hingada koDu hari bhakutiya ranganAtha padAbja brngaLe antarangada priyaLe
    caraNam 3    pakSi vAhana lakSmI ramaNana dakSa purandara viTTalana akSayadindali bhajisuvale rakSisennanu anudina
